SA17stuplaku:10: darśitaṃ lokanāthena stokaṃ stokaṃ kvacit kvacit /
SA17stuplaku:12: sarvan tan setum iveha bhadravyūhena kathyate // 2 //
SA17stuplaku:14: na khabaddhaunnate snigdhe sthāne śucini kārayet // 3 //
SA17stuplaku:18: tad aṃśena tu nemy ādi yāvad yaṣṭiśiraṃ kramāt // 5 //
SA17stuplaku:19: caturasrā bhaven nemir adhastātaḥ tad ardhena /
SA17stuplaku:22: udakodgamane yāvad ā śuddher cco bhuvaḥ smṛtāḥ // 7 //
SA17stuplaku:25: tad ūrdhvaṃ vedikāḥ kāryāḥ catustridv'eka saṃkhyayā /
SA17stuplaku:27: sārccā gṛh'; ekasaṃyuktāṃ ūrdhvāṃ vediṃ prakalpayet /
SA17stuplaku:30: tisras teṣāṃ tu kartavyā caturthaṃ biṃba ba // 11 //
SA17stuplaku:33: b is missing. From the commentary,
SA17stuplaku:34: I am quoting the fragmentary pieces of the stanzas which were included in the text portion of folio 2a,b.
SA17stuplaku:38: adho vedyā vistāras tad vedikāyā hrasve kṛtam / ... [15] (§18.6b.7).
SA17stuplaku:52: arhanta cakravartis tu pratyekaś ca jino jinaḥ // 26 //
SA17stuplaku:53: śaikṣāṇāṃ arhataś caiva gaṇakhaḍga jinasya ca /
SA17stuplaku:58: adharā bhūmi pādāya yāvad ūrdhvaṃ krameṇa tu // 29 //
SA17stuplaku:78: 17. kṣīṇāsravabalāni trīṇi cāvenikāni smṛtyupasthānāni trayodaśa cchatravalyāḥ
SA17stuplaku:79: 18. uṣṇīṣo mahākaruṇāviśuddhiḥ (Bénisti: tad upari anuttaramahākaruṇāviśuddhyā uṣṇīṣaṃ //)
SA17stuplaku:85: 23. alobhātmikacetovimukti dhvajaṃ ity api sa bhagavān ity ādi
SA17stuplaku:93: stūpaṃ kṛtvopadeśena yen'; artho jagataḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:94: tam ahaṃ śirasā vande bhadravyūhāhvayaṃ yatiṃ // 2 //
SA17stuplaku:101: yasya vāco mano dehākhatulyāḥ sarvathā muneḥ //
SA17stuplaku:102: taṃ pranasyata sātatvaṃ vakṣye vinayakārikām iti //
SA17stuplaku:103: tad ekadeśa bhūtaṃ caidam ity anena nātrābhihitaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:104: ata eva prakīrṇavinaya ity ādinā tayavatām asya sūcayati śāstrakāra ity ato na doṣaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:106_0: 6 prakīrṇake hi yad viṃśatisahasrāyuṣiprajāyāṃ bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya kṛkina rājñā
SA17stuplaku:106_1: stūpaḥ kṛtaḥ yojanam uccatvena yojanaṃ pariṇāhena ardhayojana pratisareṇa krośamātrikayā vedikayā /
SA17stuplaku:108: sthale pradeśe stūpaṃ kartavyaṃ kārayatā prācīran ty evaṃ kartavyaṃ.
SA17stuplaku:109: Slkv §7 athāṅgana (MS: athāṅgaṇa) vedī jaṃghā puṣpagrahaṇīyaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:110: ā yakā aṇḍakaṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ kaṇṭhikā harmikā cchatrāvalī cchatraṃ ghaṇṭā dhvajaḥ patākā stūpagṛha āgama puṣkiriṇī prākāra coktaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:112: cakravartibhūtena mayā yojanam uccaṃ yojanābhiveṣañ ca stūpaṃ kṛtam Slkv p. 215 iti /
SA17stuplaku:113: tad anyeṣāṃ nikāyānām iti sarvāstivādināṃ stūpakalpanāsūtre kṣudrake coktaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:115: 8 sagṛhastūpaḥ stambhaś catasraḥ pariṣaṇṇāḥ stambha sopāna lokapālā sthā sacandrasitāmbaraḥ patākā makaradhvajādayaḥ coktāḥ /
SA17stuplaku:117: sarṣapaphalamātra dhātor arthāya āmalakamātraṃ stūpaṃ kārayet /
SA17stuplaku:124: na khādi varjitonnate madhyonnate snigdhe arūkṣe śucini amedhyarahite //
SA17stuplaku:125: ity evaṃ stūpodgamapradeśaviśeṣaṃ nirdhāya lakṣaṇaṃ samupadarśayann āha /
SA17stuplaku:132: Slkv §11 evam ihāpi pariṇāhaśabdena maṇḍalanābheś caturdiśaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:134: caturthī pi kalaśādisthasaṃsthāneṣu tan mātraṃ pṛthutvasyāvyabhicārāt /
SA17stuplaku:135: kiṃ saṃbandhinā pariṇāhena kumbhasya kumbhuḥ karaṇḍaka tasya pariṇāhena stūpa dairgheṇeṣṭam ity arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:136: uktaṃ hi prakīrṇavinaye yojanam uccatvena yojanaṃ pariṇāheneti /
SA17stuplaku:138: caturasrā catuṣkoṇabhūmyāṃ kumbhaḥ karaṇḍaḥ maṇḍalānurūpyena nemivistāro bhavatīty arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:140: eṣa kaścit stūpaṃ kārayatā prācīrāntāt tāvat kārayitavyeti tad anukramārthaṃ cātra caturasrake maṇḍalasūtrapātād bāhyābāhyato madhyakoṣṭhaparikṣepo 'bhyantarataś ca /
SA17stuplaku:142: Slkv p. 216 tato 'bhyantare ca nemibhittivistārārdhena draṣṭavyam iti /
SA17stuplaku:144: udakodbhedaṃ vā yāvad āśuddher vā bhuvaḥ pṛthivyāḥ smṛtam ity arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:145: aṣṭabhāgonnatam ity ādi nemimānād aṣṭamāṃsam ādāya tenājitam unnataṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:148: vistāratas tv ayā vedikād bahiḥ kumbhapariṇāhapādenaiṣṭaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:149: catur asrikā medhī vedī jaṃghāpuṭāvedī kartavyeti /
SA17stuplaku:151: catasra pariṣaṇṇāḥ kartavyā iti catus tri dv'; eka saṃkhyāyety anenena vedikābhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate /
SA17stuplaku:157: tad āha ca catuṣkonāṣṭakoṇā vā athavā parimaṇḍaleti /
SA17stuplaku:166: puṣpagrahaṇīśabdena na ca vedikābāhyata samantato vāpya paṃktyākāreṇa nānāsaṃsthānagṛhadvāramātre pūrvajātakapratimāṇāṃ racaneti //
SA17stuplaku:168: harmikām upādāya yo 'dhaś caturthako Slkv p. 217 bāhyakoṣṭhāṃśas tatra dhānyarāśikṛtaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:176: madhyakoṣṭhapramāṇena tisro vedyaḥ kāryāḥ pariśiṣṭānāṃ tu yathā pratyanusāreneti /
SA17stuplaku:179: adhaś caturthake bhāge kṛtānāṃ tisrāṇāṃ vedīnāṃ yāvantām apramāṇaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:180: caturthī jaṃghāvedī catuṣkoṣṭhāpi kumbhasaṃsthāneṣv ity arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:184: jaṃghāsaṃbandhinī vā puṭāvedī kumbhasya padmavalitam ity arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:186: ṣaṇṇāṃ bāhyakoṣṭhānāṃ yo vistāras tad āyāmānāṃ tad dairghyām adhovedī kuryāt /
SA17stuplaku:187: atha bāhyakoṣṭhena vedikā ukteti ṣaṭsaṃkhyaparicchinna-āyāmo yasyā vedyaḥ sābāhyakoṣṭha ṣaḍāyāmamātrām adhovedīṃ kalpayet /
SA17stuplaku:188: yataḥ prakīrṇake yojanam uccasya krośamātrāvedīm ukteti /
SA17stuplaku:192: athavā catasraḥ pariṣaṇṇāḥ kartavyā iti vacanāt //
SA17stuplaku:194: ardhardhonnati Slkv p. 218 kṣīṇañ ca kalpayet /
SA17stuplaku:195: evaṃ tāvad bhūṅ gata stūpam ākhyāyādhunā bhūmimarjane stūpaṃ kṛtaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:198: ato bhūmyā nimarjanena kāraṇāyāyan darśayann āha /
SA17stuplaku:200: idan tu nimarjane nimarjanārthaṃ bhūmau stūpasya bhavatu unmānato kṣayo vedikānāṃ vistāras tu kim arthaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:202: yata stūpāyāmatulyo hy adho vedyā vistāra iṣyate /
SA17stuplaku:204: 18 yathā hy uktaṃ mahāvastuni cakravartibhūtena mayā stūpo kṛto yojanoccatvena yojanam abhiniveśeneti /
SA17stuplaku:205: yatra hi yathā dhānyarāśyākṛteḥ kumbhasya yojanāni niveśya yojanābhiniveśo gamyate /
SA17stuplaku:206: tathā vedikāyā api tu kumbhapariṇāha pramāṇena stūpa uccābhipretaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:207: adhovedyā vistāras tad vedikāyā hrasve kṛtaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:211: Slkv §19 unnāmena tathā kuryād ity ādi /
SA17stuplaku:213: harmikām upādāya yo 'dhaś caturthabāhyakoṣṭhāṃśas tasya yo vibhāgaḥ prākkṛtas tenaiva vibhāgenaikona tisro vedyaḥ jaṃghāvedikādyā ity āvyāhāryaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:214: na nirgacchet yathā biṃbam ity ādi /
SA17stuplaku:217: karaṇḍaṃ yathā nādhaḥ pratiset tathordhvāṃ vedīm unnatāṃ kuryāt /
SA17stuplaku:220: prādhyānyena ūrdhvavartinyāś caturthyā jaṃghāvedyā hrāsonnāmakaraṇenaiva kumbhasyodgamam adhomarjanañ ca saṃpadyate /
SA17stuplaku:224: adhoṃgaṇe ca kumbhe hrasvāt tato kuryād ity arthaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:229: karaṇḍaś ca tatas tūrikām iti jaṃghāpuṭāvedyā upari dhānyarāśy ādi saṃsthāne na kumbhaṃ vartulaṃ kuryāt //
SA17stuplaku:233: bāhyakoṣṭhadvayonmānavedyāsanād udgato vartulārdhapauṣṭiko dhānyarāśisaṃsthāno na tu tribhāgocchritaḥ /
SA17stuplaku:244: abhiniveśamātraṃ apāsya yaḥ satvabhāvena īṣan samādhikabāhyakoṣṭhakordhvonmānāvedyāsanān samutthitaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:246: Slkv §24 na kevalaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ pratimā kumbhena kāryā kāṃcaneti buddhapratimā api /
SA17stuplaku:248: lakṣam iti pratimālaṃkārair hi stūpam alaṃkartum iti /
SA17stuplaku:249: yatra hi pratimālaṃkārasyāpi pratiṣedhas tatra kathaṃ pratimāyā syāt /
SA17stuplaku:252: 25 tad ūrdhvaṃ bāhyakoṣṭhasyety ādi bāhyakoṣṭhasya bhāgatyāgonnāmataś caturthārdhaparityāgaḥ parigrahaḥ śeṣapādatrayasya cch (?)
SA17stuplaku:253: id unnāmas Slkv p. 220 tasya ṣaṭ kṛtvā ardhāṃśaṃ kumbhāntaḥ praviṣṭam āṃśadvayaṃ kaṇṭhakaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:254: Slkv §26 ekam āṃśakaṃ kaṇṭhikāvalitakāṃ harmikā yathākramaṃ /
SA17stuplaku:256: bāhyakoṣṭhavistārā harmikā tasyādhaḥ svonmānena samantataḥ kaṇṭhakaṃ //
SA17stuplaku:258: yathā śobhānurūpato vā anyathā kalpayed iti /
SA17stuplaku:261: pañcaviṃśatikoṣṭhavibhāgena yaṣṭer mūlamadhyaśirasā parigrahaṃ sugamo harmikāyā ūrdhvaṃ catuṣṭha pi kumbhasaṃsthāneṣu bāhyakoṣṭhadvayonmāno 'dhas va yāvat /
SA17stuplaku:264: yathā yaṣṭer āyāmakṣayāṃ vā pariṇāhakṣayo vāpy avagantavyam ity evaṃ yāvat /
SA17stuplaku:271: yataḥ proktaṃ yathā syā śobhano bhavet /
SA17stuplaku:275: yan mayoparjitaṃ puṇyaṃ tenāstu stūpas tu sugato jana iti //
SA17stuplaku:277: after this follows the Newārī note of a Nepalese librarian.
SA17stuplaku:278: Slkv §29 śrī syaṃguyāyita siyā jetanaku 35 aṃgu liḍā 5 yavanhasa 7 saaṃkanaghāva //
SA17stuplaku:279: ghātasaku 9 ku 5 ghalasaku 3 umaḍe thaṃthu ucaku 18 aṃ 5 yavanhana pramāneti madhyamādi kramena //
SA17stuplaku:280: On the top drawsheet, there are the following lines:
SA17stuplaku:281: 1 x x x x x pralase tīsijya pu manasīyā tachosathu se kho thu teya u(?)paritā na nesaṃ
SA17stuplaku:282: 2 ālayana // etad dharma x x x chela x x x x x // tad anantara draṃma (dharmma) likya
